alert.note: Alert for Randolph (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 3:40PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Randolph and central Lawrence Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 339 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Black Rock, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pocahontas... Walnut Ridge... Hoxie... Black Rock... College City... Portia... Whiskerville... Giles Spur... Shannon... Birdell... Dicus... Fender... Elnora... Sharum... Manson... Lesterville... Arbor Grove... Davidsonville Historic State Pa... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
